Welcome to part 3 of the Android Quiz ‚Äî this time you‚Äôll have a chance to test how well you know Kotlin Coroutines üéâ

Quick Reminder of the Rules:

  • Privacy First: No data is collected from you, and a Google account is not required to participate.
  • Unclear Questions? If a question or answer seems unclear or incorrect, pick the most probable answer and leave a comment. Your feedback helps improve the quiz!
  • Be Honest with Yourself: To accurately gauge your knowledge, skip questions you don‚Äôt know the answer to. Avoid guessing, as explanations for correct answers are not provided.

Ready to begin? Hover over the form and scroll down as you work through the quiz. If for any reason you can‚Äôt see the quiz, here is the direct LINK
